subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: When Don Mattingly, now in his third season as the Dodgers’ manager, returns for a two-game series against the Yankees beginning Tuesday, it will be his first trip to Yankee Stadium in six years.
snippet: When Don Mattingly, now in his third season as the Dodgers’ manager, returns for a two-game series against the Yankees beginning Tuesday, it will be his first trip to Yankee Stadium in six years.
